title: Cataphract
name: Nyriad & Cargadon
summary: The Cataphract is a formidable mounted warrior from the Levantine Sultanate, bonded with her supernatural horse. Together they form an unstoppable cavalry unit, using their combined skills to charge into battle and vanquish foes.
history: Once a respected warrior of the Levantine Sultanate, the Cataphract's life changed when her beloved horse was fatally wounded. Desperate, she stole a powerful artifact to revive him, resulting in their exile. Now the spirit of the horse speaks to her, and they fight together against the horrors of the estate.

status.description: In good health and high spirits

appearance.features: Angular facial structure and prominent cheekbones

notes: Carries the skull of her deceased horse, which grants her power
Can communicate with the horse's spirit
